paragraphs.heading: Drop-In
paragraphs.content:
Graih's Drop-In is at the very heart of what the Charity does. The Drop-In is open seven days a week - if you are not sure where we are, our address and a map on where to find us can be found in 'Contact us' page at the top. 

At the Drop-in you can have a hot meal, cup of coffee, a hot shower and clothing if needed. As well as all of this, we have staff and volunteers on hand to chat and listen around the diningroom table as well as being on hand to help keep a calm and relaxed atmosphere

paragraphs.heading: Emergency Night Shelter
paragraphs.content:
The Night Shelter opened at the start of 2019 and has been open every night since. There are always 2 staff on shift at all times who are awake and ready to welcome any one who may turn up  for shelter throughout the night. The staff ensure that all are settled and have all they need for the night and ensure the safety of the premises and our guests at all times.

Both men and women 18 years and over are welcome to stay.  At this time it is dormitory style with men in one part of the large room and women round the corner in another space.

paragraphs.heading: Support in the Community
paragraphs.content:
We support people out and about in the community, meeting people for coffee and a chat, visiting people in their homes, helping support people to maintain their tennancies. 

We visit people in hospital or Mananan court
